title: Revelation
description: Jamie thought he was lost in Limbo but nothing compares to how he feels knowing his destined mate is the one woman everyone loves to hate. He must find a way to save her and convince her that she is his while helping bring the rogue demon Balthazar down. The stakes are high as the final battle approaches, and all is revealed in the final chapter in the Keepers of Hell Series.This 7 book series is meant to be read in order.
author: Danielle James
